name: Mint Lemonade
description: Nothing washes down lunch quite like freshly made lemonade. You'll enjoy how the mint perfumes your house while you make the simple syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pot combine 2 cups water, sugar, and mint. Bring heat to medium and stir until sugar has dissolved. Let simmer for one minute then take off heat. Let cool.
Fill a large pitcher with ice. Add lemon juice, mint syrup, and 1 cup water. Stir to combine.
